wikitext.*:
'''The Council of Elrond''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* '''The [[Council of Elrond]], where the fate of [[the One Ring]] was decided.'''
==Books==
* ''[[The Council of Elrond]]'', chapter two of Book II of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* ''[[The Council of Elrond (1)]]'', the sixth chapter of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''.
* ''[[The Council of Elrond (2)]]'', the seventh chapter of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''.
==Adaptations==
* ''[[Council of Elrond (scene)]]'', scene of [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]]. 
* ''[[The Council of Elrond (1979 episode)]]'', episode of [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1979 radio series)]].
* ''[[The Council of Elrond (1981 episode)]]'', the sixth episode of [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], aired [[12 April|April 12]], [[1981]].
* ''[[The Council of Elrond (scene)]]'', a scene from the [[2001]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
** "[[The Council Of Elrond (soundtrack)]]", the tenth track from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''.
* The Council was parodied in ''[[Here Thar Be Dwarves]]'', ''[[Lord of the Piercing]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:The Martian (film)|The Martian]]''.
